org.javasimon.console.action

Class TreeXmlAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javasimon.console.Action
      • org.javasimon.console.action.AbstractXmlAction
        • org.javasimon.console.action.TreeXmlAction

  • public class TreeXmlAction
extends AbstractXmlAction
    Export Simons as a hierarchical XML document. All attributes of simons are exported.
    Author:
    gquintana
